reviewtext: I needed headphones for listening to music because the iphone original headphones hurt my ears.  These headphones are terrific. The sound quality is amazing and crystal clear.  The headphones are so comfortable I can wear them for a long period of time without ear pain. I also wear them while using my elyptical machine and they stay in place well being so light. The only thing I have noticed is when I work out with them my ears get a little sweaty but not enough to complain about.  Get them, you won't regret it.
summary: If I could give them 10 stars I would
